Faster (2010)]. [[Box Office Mojo]]. Retrieved 2011-03-24. }} 'Faster' is
a 2010 American action film directed by George Tillman, Jr., and starring Dwayne
Johnson and Billy Bob Thornton. The film was released in the United States on
November 24, 2010.
